task17
def interleave_and_remaining(listlist):
    interleaved = []
    remaining = []
    for elements in zip(*listlist):
        interleaved.extend(elements)
    remaining = [item for sublist in listlist for item in sublist[len(interleaved)//len(listlist):]]
    return interleaved, remaining

listlist = [[1, 2, 3], ['a', 'b'], [30, 40, 50, 60]]
print(interleave_and_remaining(listlist))
